tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customer (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name TEXT,
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE travel_experience (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    destination TEXT,
    travel_date DATE,
    experience_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback TEXT,
    rating INT,
    date_submitted TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE customer_reviews (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    review TEXT,
    rating INT,
    date_submitted TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE travel_services (
    service_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    service_name TEXT,
    service_description TEXT,
    price DECIMAL,
    availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE travel_experiences (
    experience_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    experience_name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    PRIMARY KEY (customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Reviews (
    review_id INT NOT NULL,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    rating INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (review_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Services (
    service_id INT NOT NULL,
    service_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    PRIMARY KEY (service_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
    feedback_id INT NOT NULL,
    review_id INT NOT NULL,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (feedback_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (review_id) REFERENCES Reviews(review_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Tags (
    tag_id INT NOT NULL,
    tag_name VARCHAR(50),
    related_service_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (tag_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (related_service_id) REFERENCES Services(service_id)
)
